keyPolicies.policyTitle: Delivering a Brexit deal that works for everyone in our city
keyPolicies.policyDescription: If elected I'll support the Government to deliver Brexit by the end of January so that we can focus on the other key issues facing Nottingham.

I stand behind the Prime Minister's commitment to 'level-up' opportunity across the UK with investment in education, infrastructure and technology. I will always stand up to ensure that every child in our city is able to reach their full potential.

Once we move past the Brexit deadlock we can get on with delivering upgrades to our public services. We are committed to providing 20,000 more Police Officers, £33.9bn of extra funding annually for the NHS and £14bn extra spending on our schools over the next three years.

mentions.candidate: I will always stand up to ensure that every child in our city is able to reach their full potential.
